what: Calculate kinematics from position data ‚Äî calculate_kinematics
title: Calculate kinematics from position data ‚Äî calculate_kinematics
text: Calculates kinematic measurements including translational rotational motion position data. function computes velocities, accelerations, angular measurements x-y coordinate time series data.

text: data data frame containing minimum: time (numeric): Time points measurements x (numeric): X-coordinates y (numeric): Y-coordinates Character vector specifying additional grouping variables (optional). input data frame already grouped, groups preserved additional groups specified added.

title: Calculate kinematics from position data ‚Äî calculate_kinematics
text: data frame containing original data plus calculated kinematics: distance: Distance traveled consecutive points v_translation: Translational velocity a_translation: Translational acceleration direction: Movement direction radians rotation: Angular change consecutive points v_rotation: Angular velocity a_rotation: Angular acceleration

code: # Basic usage with just x-y coordinates df <- aniframe::example_aniframe() calculate_kinematics(df) #> # Individuals: 1, 2, 3 #> # Keypoints:   head, neck, shoulder_right, shoulder_left, abdomen, hip_right, #> #   hip_left, knee_right, knee_left, foot_right, foot_left #> # Sessions:    1 #> # Trials:      1 #>    session trial individual keypoint  time        x       y confidence #>      <int> <int> <fct>      <fct>    <int>    <dbl>   <dbl>      <dbl> #>  1       1     1 1          head         1  0.255    0.932       0.802 #>  2       1     1 1          head         2 -2.44    -0.651       0.516 #>  3       1     1 1          head         3 -0.00557  0.436       0.725 #>  4       1     1 1          head         4  0.622   -0.164       0.484 #>  5       1     1 1          head         5  1.15     1.27        0.779 #>  6       1     1 1          head         6 -1.82     0.415       0.566 #>  7       1     1 1          head         7 -0.247   -0.0481      0.931 #>  8       1     1 1          head         8 -0.244    0.198       0.578 #>  9       1     1 1          head         9 -0.283   -0.389       0.806 #> 10       1     1 1          head        10 -0.554   -0.452       0.790 #> # ‚Ñπ 1,640 more rows #> # ‚Ñπ 7 more variables: d_translation <dbl>, v_translation <dbl>, #> #   a_translation <dbl>, direction <circular>, d_rotation <circular>, #> #   v_rotation <circular>, a_rotation <circular>
